roleset.name: sort into groups based on severity of need
roleset.note: TRIAGE-V, TRIAGE-N, DO_TRIAGE-L NOTES: Added by Julia for THYME.

example.name: triage-v
example.text: Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation was consulted *PRO* to help assess and triage the patient 's physical and occupational therapy needs .
example.arg: the patient's physical and occupational therapy needs

example.name: triage-n
example.text: The optimal triage of trauma patients has been the source of vigorous debate over the years.

example.name: do_triage-l
example.text: They do triage based on the urgency of the injuries.
example.arg: based on the urgency of the injuries
